Text:
Tackar!
Har väntat på denna! Men, är extramaterialet med?
Det är lika viktigt som filmen, tycker jag!
The file is too large to burn DVD-R! How i can burn it??? Somebody please answer!

I just burned it (making use of a double layer dvd of course) and want to thank Ubehage the uploader for the movie, for the good dvd edition and specially for not compressing e uploading the dvd with full qaulity, languages, subs, special features etc. Thanks again!

Why i cant burn this?! When i try to burn this movie to DVD+R DL with alcohol 120%, CPU Speed becomes to 0% and i get a error message... same thing happened to Nero. How i can get this shit work?!? And sorry for bad english.....

GOR1LLA>

This file requires a dual-layer dvd disc.
You might mount it with Alcohol120%, and then shrink it to single-layer size...
DO NOT DOWNLOAD - There is  BUG in the middle of the disc when one plays it (on computer and once burnt onto a DVD DL (even compressed on a DVD) - the BUG is always there...
@gorilla: Use Daemon tool, then rip it, then burn it
